tasks.label: build and run
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && for f in $(find src -name '*.asm'); do nasm -f elf64 "$f" -o "build/$(basename ${f%.asm}.o)"; done && ld build/*.o -o build/main && ./build/main

tasks.label: debug
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && for f in $(find src -name '*.asm'); do nasm -f elf64 -g "$f" -o "build/$(basename ${f%.asm}.o)"; done && ld build/*.o -o build/main && gnome-terminal --full-screen -- bash -c 'gdb -ex "set disassembly-flavor intel" -ex "layout asm" -ex "layout regs" build/main; exec bash'
